subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: For Dean Richardson, the surgeon who worked so hard to save Barbaro’s life and who developed an emotional attachment to his famous patient, saying goodbye was a final, and intensely poignant, moment.
snippet: For Dean Richardson, the surgeon who worked so hard to save Barbaro’s life and who developed an emotional attachment to his famous patient, saying goodbye was a final, and intensely poignant, moment.
